price: 24.nummah Nabii Aadamak xabba haanamaay tawayâ fan siinik rabtem Nanu neexegeh, nummah siinik nuwwam kee Qhiyaamah ayrô fanah tamaatu waytaamay wadirrowte Nanu Neexegeh.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'taqdimīna minkum walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'takhirīna
